TopicTitle: Kerbals clipping into ground and dying

Articles.Content: When using Galaxies Unbound, Kopernicus, and Kopernicus Expansion, as well as the Kopernicus watchdog (which I thought was supposed to fix this?), When landing on a planet, if a Kerbal on EVA strays too far from their landing craft, they will clip into the ground and go poof. Is there a way to fix this?
